snippet.title: Episode 181 - The Future of Education with Dr. Zak Stein
snippet.description:
Education affects the brain?  Oh, wait!  Yeah, it does, doesn't it?  Philosopher of education Dr. Zak Stein explains how we can (and must) reboot the educational system to correspond to what we know from neuroscience.
Click here to access the episode bookmarks from SmartDrugSmarts.com: http://smartdrugsmarts.com/episode-181-future-of-education/

About Smart Drug Smarts 
Smart Drug Smarts is the leading podcast for people curious about brain health and optimization. Breakthroughs in neuroscience are leading to real-world applications -- including ways to make ourselves smarter. Smart Drug Smarts provides a wealth of information in a field where the possibilities are growing daily.

Get more Smart Drug Smarts! Visit us at http://smartdrugsmarts.com
